text:
Equifax was hacked, but just before the announcement, three top executives sold their stock and cashed in before the stock plummeted. Hurricane Harvey is gone, but could it be an economic booster shot? Danielle DiMartino Booth weighs in. Hurricane Irma is heading to Florida, and it will also mean billions in damage. Meanwhile, the Trump administration has halted an Obama rule on data collection and wage gaps. Find out what Hadley Heath Manning has to say about it. We’ve got that and more on this episode of Boom Bust!

title: Equifax hack attack
